message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $13,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the recommendation, but I am only able to pay up to $9,000 for it.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $11,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I still can't go above $9,500 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
